phrases: You can jump or run... but you cannot escape my wind!
Now is the time to escape...
Now when Naraku's barrier is weak.
He has the power to sever the bond between me and Naraku!
I am glad you remembered me.
Take your hand off your sword.
I did not come here to fight.
Sesshomaru, I want to make a deal with you.
I will give these Sacred Jewel shards to you.
You have the power to do it.
all the Sacred Jewel shards he has gathered will be yours.
Let us use these shards and have some fun.
It is not like I ever wanted to be under his command.
I do not think it is a bad idea to team up with me.
Unfortunately, I have no interest in the Sacred Jewel.
If you wish to become free,
use those shards yourself and destroy Naraku.
I am just saying I am under no obligation to help you.
If you do not have the resolve to go it alone,
do not even think about betrayal.
You still call yourself a man?!
I wonder if she really intended to make you her protector?
Talk about gall... the nerve of her!
You do not need the power of the Sacred Jewel!
I wonder if she can use the Sacred Jewel and defeat Naraku by herself?
It does not matter to me.
But I wonder if she was lonely because she was all alone?
What shall we do about dinner?
Oh, maybe I wound it too tight.
Because of your gentleness, I do not feel the pain anymore.
Leave that half-dead wolf demon alone, Kagome!
If it does not hurt anymore, just go on home!
Are not we going to take back the Sacred Jewel shards?
Why would I let you have them?!
Then Kagura has not returned to the castle?
Instead, I feel as though the Sacred Jewel shards are going...
farther and farther away from Naraku's castle.
Kagura is an offshoot of Naraku himself.
Is not she acting according to Naraku's will?
Does that mean Kagura is stealing the shards?
Do not you think it is strange, Inuyasha?
Why did you and Koga pick up the scent of the castle?
Is not that because Naraku's own powers are weak?
He used the body of a human named Onigumo,
and gathered the powers of countless demons.
In the same way that Inuyasha loses his powers on the night of the new moon,
perhaps Naraku has a day when his powers wane.
How dare he say those things to me?!
If you do not have the resolve to go it alone,
do not even think of betrayal.
Thanks for taking care of me!
Unlike that twerp, I am a REAL demon!
Sango, Koga does not have his Sacred Jewel shards anymore.
He does not have a chance!
Inuyasha, lay low for a bit longer.
Inuyasha must not be seen in his state.
I am taking back the shards you took from me!
And you are relying on help from Inuyasha and his gang?
Without these, you are too scared to fight alone?
I still have my claws and fangs!
Dodging's about all I can do!
I do not have the time to bother with YOU!
If you want to be free,
use the Sacred Jewel shards and destroy Naraku yourself.
It is not even a fight!
Naraku has not realized that I tried to betray him?
Does he intend to get rid of me?
What are you standing in a daze for?!
He will be killed unless we help him!
Do not try to stop me!
l just want the Sacred Jewel shards!
If Koga is killed and this battle ends,
Kagura will make her escape again!
I cannot just stand around and watch!
Inuyasha will return to his half-demon state!
But if he is seen before that...
You are all mere mortals, yet you have fought hard!
Is not that because you believed in your own power?
Well, as if I can hold back!
Koga, you are a glutton for punishment, are not you?
Why do not you just give up?
It is really not much fun killing a half-dead wolf, is it?
I will take you on now!
For a moment, I saw Inuyasha...
Do you think Kagura saw Inuyasha in his human state?
A second later, and Koga, you would have been killed by Kagura's wind.
knowing that his secret would be revealed.
There was no moon last night.
So you lose your powers on a moonless night?
I am back so it does not matter!
'Cuz you are going to die right here and now!
He is going to get me!
I hope this teaches you never to interfere in my fight with Naraku!
I have sworn to avenge my comrades against Naraku!
I will be the one to take Naraku's head!
I could care less what shape that mutt takes.
Does that mean he will not tell?
I think we can count on Koga.
Naraku does not know about my treachery.
That is why he used the demons to save me.
Naraku nourishes his body with these demons...
Like Inuyasha, Naraku is a half-demon!
While I slept, you left the castle, did not you?
You are a part of me.
Would you like to return to my flesh again?
I promise I will not do it again!
I cannot escape from Naraku alone.
I will let you live for a bit longer.
You are my precious trump card.
Sango and I must get even stronger,
Besides, I am the one who comes through in a clutch.
I mean, before Inuyasha met you all,
he would never let anyone see his human form.
Who said anything about depending on anyone?!
- I think you are! - I think so, too!
You can depend on us anytime, Inuyasha!
That is why he was not discouraged on the night of the new moon.
And that could be the secret to his strength.
I am Shippo, the child fox-demon of justice!
And I received a letter of challenge!
